rows.label: qst202505_msg0001
rows.name:
I see...then the light that was reported
coming from the World Tree was an
attack performed by this Blade?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0002
rows.name:
It is quite difficult to believe that a
single Blade could produce such
remarkable levels of energy...

rows.label: qst202505_msg0003
rows.name:
You got that right. I saw it myself,
and I still had trouble believing it!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0004
rows.name: But it's the truth.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0005
rows.name:
Were it not for KOS-MOS RE: Re:'s attack,
we would all have been defeated by
those rogue artificial Blades.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0006
rows.name:
Hmmm... Well, as long as you have
that power safely under control,
I suppose it is not a problem.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0007
rows.name: Thank you for your explanation.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0008
rows.name:
Regarding the artificial Blades, they
are indeed a worrying development.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0009
rows.name:
They are capable of flight, yes?
It seems difficult to guarantee that
they will remain on the World Tree.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0010
rows.name:
There is a very real possibility that
berserk artificial Blades could end up
descending upon nearby nations.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0011
rows.name: True enough.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0012
rows.name:
I will make use of the Luxuria military
and strengthen surveillance around
the World Tree.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0013
rows.name:
We are most grateful for your wise
decision, Your Majesty.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0014
rows.name:
However, I feel we will need the
cooperation of the other nations
in this matter.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0015
rows.name:
What do you say, Meleph-dono?
Would you lend me your aid in this?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0016
rows.name: But of course.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0017
rows.name:
I will report this incident to Superbia,
and advise His Majesty the Emperor to
take suitable preventative action.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0018
rows.name:
You have my thanks, Meleph-dono.
I leave the Emperor to you, then.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0019
rows.name:
Ah yes, one more thing.
There is a request I would like to
make of you all.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0020
rows.name: A request?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0021
rows.name: What's all this about, then?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0022
rows.name: Enter, please.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0023
rows.name: Who's that?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0024
rows.name: Someone you know, Turtle-chan?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0025
rows.name: Hmmmm? Can't say I recognize her...

rows.label: qst202505_msg0026
rows.name:
It is a pleasure to meet you, Uncle.
My name is Astelle.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0027
rows.name: I hope we will get along!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0028
rows.name:
U-Uncle?!
What's going on here, Pops?!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0029
rows.name:
This young lady is the daughter
of your cousin.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0030
rows.name:
It is perhaps no surprise that you were
not aware of her existence.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0031
rows.name:
She was born after you left
this country, after all.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0032
rows.name:
Strictly speaking, that makes us first
cousins once removed. I hope you don't
mind me addressing you as Uncle!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0033
rows.name:
U-uh, I dunno what I'm really meant
to do with a...niece, or cousin, or
whatever you are...

rows.label: qst202505_msg0034
rows.name:
Well, well, well. Isn't this the sweetest
little family reunion...Uncle?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0035
rows.name: Shaddup, you!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0036
rows.name:
Despite her youth, Astelle is something
of a prodigy who has read all of the
books in the Teos Aure library.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0037
rows.name:
I fear she may have begun to grow
tired of living cooped up here in Luxuria.
She is quite the spirited young lady.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0038
rows.name:
Most recently, she expressed a desire
to explore the Land of Mors.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0039
rows.name:
Of course, I told her I could not
possibly allow such a dangerous outing.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0040
rows.name:
But now she is instead insisting on
visiting all the other nations of Alst,
before they sink entirely.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0041
rows.name:
I believe it was you who said I would
do well to see the world, Your Majesty.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0042
rows.name:
I am simply trying to live up to
your expectations.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0043
rows.name: You see what I have to deal with?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0044
rows.name:
I don't know where she gets this willful
nature from, but once she sets her mind
on something, there is no changing it.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0045
rows.name:
As such, while I must apologize
for the trouble...

rows.label: qst202505_msg0046
rows.name:
Might I ask you to take her with you
on your trip to Superbia?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0047
rows.name:
Take this girl with us on some
international tour?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0048
rows.name:
We're not just traveling for the
fun of it, you know!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0049
rows.name:
I am quite aware of that,
thank you very much.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0050
rows.name:
But you needn't worry about me.
I won't cause any trouble.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0051
rows.name:
In fact, I might be able to assist
you in some way, Uncle!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0052
rows.name:
E-enough with the uncle thing!
Can't I at least be, like...a big brother
or something?!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0053
rows.name:
Oh, if you insist. Let's have a
lovely trip together, "big bro"!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0055
rows.name:
Wow, Turtle-chan. I didn't know
you were into that.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0056
rows.name:
Um, my Prince? Forgive my saying so,
but...you're creeping me out a little.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0057
rows.name: Oh, for the...!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0058
rows.name: Hey, what's your name?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0059
rows.name: I am KOS-MOS RE: Re:.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0060
rows.name: Cosmos? That's a funny sort of name.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0061
rows.name: You're a Blade, are you?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0062
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0063
rows.name:
That's a pretty unusual body
you've got there.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0064
rows.name:
It's almost like you're part machine.
Are the machine parts and human parts
connected somehow?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0065
rows.name:
Do you...have some kind of problem
with my body?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0066
rows.name: Problem? No, no problem.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0067
rows.name:
Hey, would you mind if I tinkered
around with the bits inside?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0068
rows.name: I cannot permit that.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0069
rows.name:
Even if my Master were to order me
directly, I could not comply.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0070
rows.name:
I thought you might say that...
A shame, a shame.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0071
rows.name:
Oh, well! It's going to be a pleasure
traveling with you, KOS-MOS RE: Re:!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0072
rows.name: I look forward to it, Astelle.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0073
rows.name: Shall we leave at once, then?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0074
rows.name: Come on, "big bro," you lead the way!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0075
rows.name: Urkkk...

rows.label: qst202505_msg0076
rows.name:
What're you making that look for...
"big bro"?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0077
rows.name: We're leaving you behind, "big bro"!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0078
rows.name: Will you all give it a rest already!
